authors.author: Caroline Sandell-Berg Ernest W. Olson Oscar Ahnfel

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Children of the heavenly Father, newline Safely in His bosom gather; newline Nestling bird nor star in heaven newline Such a refuge e'er was given.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: God His own doth tend and nourish, newline In His holy courts they flourish; newline From all evil things He spares them, newline In His mighty arms He bears them.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Neither life nor death shall ever, newline From the Lord His children sever; newline Unto them His grace He showeth, newline And their sorrows all He knoweth.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Lo, their very hairs He numbers, newline And no daily care encumbers; newline Them that share His every blessing, newline And His help in woes distressing.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Praise the Lord in joyful numbers, newline Your protector never slumbers; newline At the will of your defender, newline Every foe man must surrender.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Though He giveth or He taketh, newline God His children ne'er forsaketh; newline His the loving purpose solely newline To preserve them pure and holy.
